Name: Bird
About the game: Sometimes we all want to soar into the heavens and fly up into the distance, like a carefree bird ... And now you have such an opportunity! Meet Bird, a relaxing third-person bird simulator. Your goal is simple - follow the circles and avoid any terrain obstacles, because they can hurt the bird or worse, cripple! Remember that big wings come with great responsibility, take a wide sweep and fly towards the endless polar desert! Game features: - Lots of bird species. - Endless game play. - Nice graphics and gameplay. - Relaxing atmosphere.
